äölentäöl |uiua|
=========

**äölentäöl** (IPA: [œːləntœːl]) is a random quote fetching console utility. Written in Uiua.

|screenshot|

Installing
----------

+ Use latest release from `releases <https://github.com/q60/aolentaol/releases>`__

Building and installing manually
--------------------------------

You need *GNU make* and *Uiua* to build **äölentäöl**.

.. code-block:: sh

    make
    sudo make install

Running
-------

.. code-block:: sh

    aolentaol

Uninstalling
------------

.. code-block:: sh

    sudo make uninstall

.. |screenshot| image:: https://i.imgur.com/cJIjbVX.png
.. |uiua| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/-Uiua-171D22?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
